TopicTitle: Sliders to determine how often certain contracts are offered

Articles.Content: Currently, all the contracts are offered almost randomly. Some people like to only fly certain contracts. Declining a contract is certainly possible, but it can get tedious. A slider to adjust how often certain contracts are offered would be better. That way if someone gets bored with one contract type, they can adjust the offerings.
This sounds like a very good idea.

Some sort of filtering system for contracts is certainly in order, that much I don't think anyone is going to argue with. My idea was for a toggle system, but this idea would allow for more flexibility.
